name: Lab Escape (Tristan Fish)
description:
You are a secret government experiment that is trying to escape from a government facility. You Have found an EMP weapon on your way out,you need to use it to interact with objects and temporarily shut down the guards. This is our groups submission to the two week game jam. This Game was built in two weeks by 6  first year students from Humber College. 

!For Best Experience Play in 1280 *1024!

Created And Designed By: 

Tristan - Team Lead

Mark - Programmer 

Kyle - Designer

Miles - Designer 

Jared - Artist

Luca - Sound Engineer
